MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML12 postcode area of Biggar. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:30pm to replace a faulty transformer at Ten Langholm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:50pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:02pm on the 8th of December 2020.
